= Upcoming Events =

11th October - [http://gotocon.com/aarhus-2011/tracks/show_track.jsp?trackOID=462 Goto Aarhus]. Martin Thompson and Dave Farley will be presenting the LMAX Disruptor pattern: "100K transactions per second at less than 1ms latency".

13th - 14th October - [http://gotocon.com/amsterdam-2011/ Goto Amsterdam]. Martin Thompson and Dave Farley will be tackling the folklore surrounding high performance computing.
